mean_cn: n. 闪光;  刹那;  vi. 闪光;  发火花;  adj. 炫耀的;  浮夸的;  一闪而过的;  vt. 闪, 闪烁;
sentence: The lightning struck with a flash of light.
sentence_tra: 闪电击出闪光。

sentence: I took my dog to the vet to be examined.
sentence_tra: 我带我的狗去兽医那里检查。

sentence: One hundred centimetres is equal to one meter.
sentence_tra: 一百厘米等于一米。

sentence: The journalist interviews her guests on TV.
sentence_tra: 记者电视采访她的嘉宾。

sentence: His huge size is due to his beer drinking habits.
sentence_tra: 他肥胖是因为他有喝啤酒的习惯。

mean_cn: n. 调查表, 征求意见表;
sentence: Please fill out this questionnaire so we can improve our service.
sentence_tra: 请填写这份调查问卷，这样就能帮助我们改善服务。

mean_cn: n.基础，基地，底座adj.差的，次的
sentence: The bases of these pillars have to support a lot of weight.
sentence_tra: 这些柱子的底座得承受巨大的重量。

sentence: I work in construction - I build houses.
sentence_tra: 我在建筑行业工作―我盖房子。

sentence: I don't know who you are, but I can assume you're my wife.
sentence_tra: 我不知道你是谁，但我猜你是我的妻子。

mean_cn: n. 存在;  持续存在;  发生;  生存;  生活方式;  存在物;
sentence: Do you believe in the existence of dragons?
sentence_tra: 你相信龙的存在吗？

mean_cn: n.储备，后备，保护区v.储备，保留，预定
sentence: The store keeps a large reserve in case prices suddenly go higher.
sentence_tra: 仓库保持大量库存以防物价突涨。

sentence: I'll look into what your computer problem is.
sentence_tra: 我来研究一下你的电脑出了什么问题。

mean_cn: n. 幽默; 诙谐; 幽默感; 脾气; 心情;  vt. 迎合; 迁就; 使自己适应;
sentence: Women love men with a good sense of humour.
sentence_tra: 女性喜欢有幽默感的男性。

sentence: Unicorns only exist in fairy tales.
sentence_tra: 独角兽只存在于童话故事中。

sentence: I told her I wanted to break up and she attacked me!
sentence_tra: 我告诉她我想分手，然后她就打了我！

sentence: China always wins all the table tennis medals at the Olympics.
sentence_tra: 中国总是在奥运会包揽所有乒乓球金牌。

sentence: I have never seen such an unusual incident in my life.
sentence_tra: 我长这么大从没见过这么不同寻常的事件。

sentence: I use a tape to measure the length of the wood.
sentence_tra: 我用卷尺测量木头长度。

sentence: We watched the spaceship land on the moon on TV.
sentence_tra: 我们在电视上看到了太空船落在月球上。

sentence: He stayed up late at night with his book, just so he could finish reading the tale.
sentence_tra: 他晚上熬夜，就是为了能看完书上的这个故事。

mean_cn: n.可能，可能性；可能的事，希望
sentence: There's a possibility I'm right; then again, I might be wrong.
sentence_tra: 有可能我是对的，当然也有可能我是错的。

mean_cn: n.目击者，见证人；证据，证言v.目击，注意到；为…作证
sentence: He was the only witness to the murder; he can tell us what really happened.
sentence_tra: 他是这场谋杀案的唯一目击者，他能告诉我们发生了什么。

sentence: I'm puzzled about why I spend so much money.
sentence_tra: 我很困惑为什么我花了这么多的钱。

sentence: His boss dismissed him from his job for making too many mistakes.
sentence_tra: 他在工作上犯了很多错，他的老板因此解雇了他。

sentence: The baby is due in about one month.
sentence_tra: 再有一个月宝宝就该出生了。

sentence: The aliens are considering landing on Earth.
sentence_tra: 外星人在考虑在地球上登陆。

sentence: The man tries to solve the mystery of the missing question mark.
sentence_tra: 这个男人试着解答失踪的问号这个神秘事件。

sentence: The astronomer watches the stars.
sentence_tra: 天文学家在观测行星。

sentence: Show your strength! Hit it again!
sentence_tra: 展示出你的力量！再来一击！

sentence: The sunrise is so amazing!
sentence_tra: 日出美得惊人！

sentence: A fur coat is very warm, but very expensive!
sentence_tra: 皮毛外套很温暖，但也很昂贵。

sentence: Is your favorite creature the dog, cat, or rabbit?
sentence_tra: 你最喜欢的动物是狗，猫还是兔子？

sentence: You belong in our group - please join us.
sentence_tra: 你属于我们的团队，请加入我们。

sentence: The villager brings water home.
sentence_tra: 村民把水打回家。

sentence: A dozen eggs now costs twenty dollars--how expensive!
sentence_tra: 一打鸡蛋现在要20美元！好贵啊！

sentence: Every full moon there are more reported sightings of UFOs.
sentence_tra: 每到满月UFO目击报告就会更多。

mean_cn: phr. 组成; 补足; 化妆; 编造;
sentence: The red slice makes up about a quarter of the whole.
sentence_tra: 这红色的部分占整体的1/4。

mean_cn: n.勾号，(钟表)滴答声，一刹那v.用勾作为记号，发出滴答声
sentence: I tick the boxes one by one.
sentence_tra: 我挨个在勾选框打了勾。

sentence: Buy it this week, while you can still get a discount.
sentence_tra: 这周就买了它吧，还能享受折扣。

sentence: I run down the track as fast as I can.
sentence_tra: 我沿着跑道尽我最快速度跑。

sentence: Keep every piece of evidence to help us solve the crime.
sentence_tra: 保存每一条证据以帮助我们侦破犯罪案件。

mean_cn: n. 奖品;  奖学金;  vt. 判定;  授予;
sentence: I can't believe I won the award for best actress.
sentence_tra: 真不敢相信我得了最佳女演员奖。

sentence: The boss went to work despite his injury.
sentence_tra: 老板不顾伤痛也要去工作。

sentence: Car accidents can occur very quickly.
sentence_tra: 车祸会发生在一瞬间。

mean_cn: adj.不清楚的，使人莫名其妙的
sentence: How the camel got there remains unexplained.
sentence_tra: 骆驼怎么会出现在那里是个莫名其妙的问题。

sentence: A detective must know how to see through people's lies.
sentence_tra: 侦探必须知道如何看穿人们的谎言。

sentence: Please organize the files by number.
sentence_tra: 请按编号整理好文件。

sentence: We always disagree about what to eat for dinner.
sentence_tra: 对于晚饭吃什么我们总是意见不合。

sentence: It was tough, but I finally convinced the businessmen to use my idea.
sentence_tra: 这很难，但我最终说服了那个商人来用我的点子。

sentence: The family burst into laughter together.
sentence_tra: 一家人笑成一团。

mean_cn: n.例子；箱子；情况v. 包围；把…装于容器中
sentence: As a lawyer, I have lots of cases to deal with.
sentence_tra: 作为一个律师，我有大量的案件需要处理。

mean_cn: adj.狂热的，极感兴趣的，热情的
sentence: He's always so enthusiastic about video games--he loves them so much.
sentence_tra: 他对电子游戏总是充满热情，他非常喜欢游戏！
